# change the .me to Project

df

# colunms says donations are in the USD but some are taking ETH, BTC etc values. 

# Convert columns to numeric type

df.price_usd = pd.to_numeric(df.price_usd, errors='coerce')

df.raised_usd = pd.to_numeric(df.raised_usd, errors='coerce')

# replace numerical/categorical variables with tbeir mean/freq.

mean2 = df.distributed_in_ico.mean()

mean3 = df.price_usd.mean()

bounti = 'Not Available'

MVP = 'Not Available'

Platform = 'Ethereum'


df.token_for_sale = df.token_for_sale.fillna(0)

df.distributed_in_ico = df.distributed_in_ico.fillna(mean2)

df.price_usd = df.price_usd.fillna(mean3)

df.bounty = df.bounty.fillna(bounti)

df.mvp = df.mvp.fillna(MVP)

df.platform = df.platform.fillna(Platform)

df.dropna(subset = {'raised_usd'}, axis = 0, inplace = True)
df

#Replaced some inconsistent words
df.country = df.country.replace({'SINGAPORE' : 'Singapore', 'Saint Vincent and the Gre.dines' : 'Saint Vincent and the Grenadines', 'Gha.' : 'Ghana', 'russia' : 'Russia'})

df.platform = df.platform.replace({'ERC-20' : 'Ethereum', '\u200bKomodo' : 'Komodo', 'Separate blockchain' : 'Separate Blockchain', 'Bitshares' : 'BitShares', 'X-11' : 'X11'})

# Creating a date range
# calculate the difference between ico_start and ico_end
df['fundraise_period'] = (df.ico_end - df.ico_start).dt.days

# drop rows where end date is less than start date (This is because after running the first code, it was discovered there a number days that are giving a minus)
df = df.drop(df[df.ico_end < df.ico_start].index)
df
